text:
CSV Files are very big in nyc data, so we instead of using Pandas/Python kernel , we can try Pyspark Kernel
Documentation of Mage for using pyspark kernel: https://docs.mage.ai/integrations/spark-pyspark
?
question: Since I was using slow laptop, and we have so big csv files, I used pyspark kernel in mage instead of python, How to do it?
